apiClassifier.shortdesc: psd blend mode key: norm' = normal 'dark' = darken 'lite' = lighten hue ' = hue 'sat ' = saturation 'colr' = color lum ' = luminosity 'mul ' = multiply 'scrn' = screen diss' = dissolve 'over' = overlay 'hLit' = hard light 'sLit' = soft light diff' = difference 'smud' = exclusion 'div ' = color dodge 'idiv' = color burn lbrn' = linear burn, 'lddg' = linear dodge, 'vLit' = vivid light lLit' = linear light, 'pLit' = pin light, 'hMix' = hard mix pass' = pass through, 'dkCl' = darker color, 'lgCl' = lighter color fsub' = subtract, 'fdiv' = divide
